sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SERIPHIUM, in botany ; a genus of plants belonging to the order of monogamia, and to the claſs of ſyngeneſia. The calyx is imbricated ; the corolla is manopetalous and regular, with one oblong ſeed under it. There is only one ſpecies, the cinereum, which is a native of the Cape of Good Hope.
